name: IDZSwiftCommonCrypto
summary: A wrapper for Apple's Common Crypto library written in Swift.
prepare_command:
touch prepare_command.txt
echo 'Running prepare_command'
if [ ! -e CommonCrypto ]; then 
  pwd
  echo Running GenerateCommonCryptoModule
  ./GenerateCommonCryptoModule iphonesimulator9.1 .  
else 
  echo Skipped GenerateCommonCryptoModule 
fi
